CustomField.description: Date SA to be completed by
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(FS_What_type_of_Site_Assessment__c,"SA Not Required - OSM approval required for local market")) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(FS_Perf_Site_Assessment__c,"No")&& NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(FS_Perf_Site_Assessment__c))) )),DATEVALUE(FS_Request_submitted_Date_Time__c) + CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(FS_Request_submitted_Date_Time__c)- DATE(1900,01,07) ,7 ), 0, 12, 1, 14,2,14,3,14,4,14,5,14,13),Null)
CustomField.label: Date SA to be completed by
